p: Mice were infected with 1.2 × 10 5 IFU ZIKV-Nluc/ZIKVwt by intraperitoneal (i.p.) injection, or 6 ×10 4 IFU ZIKV-Nluc/ZIKVwt by footpad injection. PBS was injected into the mock-infected mice by the same route. The clinical course of viral infection was monitored by survival, weight loss, and disease symptoms.
